channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cognos Business Intelligence
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cognos Business Intelligence

item.title: CVE-2017-1486|2024-09-17T03:02:06.189Z -- ibm -- cognos%20business%20intelligence
item.description: IBM Cognos Business Intelligence 10.2, 10.2.1, 10.2.1.1, and 10.2.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 128624.
